mapper.insert:
insert into rental_utility (year, month, house_id, house_name, room_id, room_number, floor, water, electricity, status, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time, update_user_id, update_user_name, update_time) values
(#{utility.year}, #{utility.month}, #{utility.houseId}, #{utility.houseName}, #{utility.roomId}, #{utility.roomNumber}, #{utility.floor}, #{utility.water}, #{utility.electricity},#{utility.status}, #{utility.createUserId}, #{utility.createUserName}, #{utility.createTime}, #{utility.updateUserId}, #{utility.updateUserName}, #{utility.updateTime})
